title: Chinese ‘Wolf Warrior’ Diplomat Enrages Australia With Twitter Post
sub_head: Australian prime minister demands apology for official’s use of a photo, which Australia says is doctored, showing an Australian soldier apparently threatening an Afghan child
body:
SYDNEY—The picture was shocking: an Australian soldier apparently holding a knife to the throat of an Afghan child. Just as appalling for Australia’s government, which said the image was doctored, was that it was tweeted by a Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman to his more than 780,000 followers.
The photo, with a caption saying, “Don’t be...
